input.sentences: [female] and [male] set off on their road trip to the old farm house .
they passed over several old bridges on their way .
they stopped to wade in some rapids .
finally | after a couple hours of driving | they started to see lots of green fields .
just before sunset | they made it to the old farm | where they were staying on vacation .
output.sentences: The trip began with a winding road.
We passed bridges along the way; they were very beautiful shaded by the trees.
After, we stopped at the rapids to observe the water, dip our feet in, and take photographs.
Hours passed, and the hills and trees disappeared, giving way to green fields and fresh farmland.
Just as the sun began to set, we came upon the vacation home where we would be staying.
